descriptionHTML:
Are you ready to face your fears?

You are in a hospital corridor which fear and horror in nested.
You are feeling which fear and death pester to you in every step.

In a hospital which contains paranormal activities, it is very difficult to survive if your nerves is not hard as steel.
You can't determine who is angel who is devil.

Extraordinary atmosphere, nervous scenario and blood-curdling flow, you are one step ahead of comic book horror game.

In second story, young girl couldn't get rid of nightmares and curiosity. There is only way to get rid of this hell which threaten her mental health. Face it! Of course young man won't leave alone the girl and our story continues from where it left.

If you have courage, what are you waiting for?

- Amazing graphics
- Detailed areas
- Unique musics
- Completely free

Note: We recommend that play the game with headset.

★ Twitter: http://twitter.com/heisengamess
★ Instagram: http://instagram.com/heisengamess
★ Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/heisengames
★ Web: http://www.heisengames.net
summary: The horror continues!
title: Horror Hospital 2

comments: Easy decision to drop down 7 bucks for a killer racquet. I will ALWAYS support devs that make GREAT games with zero ads. This IS fast paced that requires perfect timing to lay down some killer shots. Drop shots are down with ease. If timed perfectly, hard shots stays inbounds.. 7 bucks for a gem? No question on this one. THIS IS THE BEST TENNIS GAME. Kinda like ping pong. I also love one of the Stickman tennis games too, but stick tennis is a gem. Other tennis games are just too easy Thanks to the developer, for no advertisements.. I despise ads

Generally good game, but the save game feature needs work. Why bother logging me in every time if when I close the app for more than a few hours it loses any saved data. Please fix and I would give it a higher rating
How can I play best of 5 sets? All the slams are 1 set matches only? Either you screenshots are outdated or I am unable to find the right settings. Thx

Need to make ur umpire and ball boys move,  will add to the fun. Otherwise a good game and I have been playing it for two years now. Reduce the unnecessary applaud or may be reduce the length it goes on for.
The game is too tough. The only thing I'm able to do is giving the opposition points by shooting out of the line. Not good at all.

It's a nice game to play with ace players and hand to eye control is very important along with utmost concentration. The difficulty level of the game increases slowly which is nice. But sometimes I found the game gets stuck or lagging is evident.

description: Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.The game offers 5 modes :Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)Bonus mode.Game Features:- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.- Free game: play the game for free!- Choose your super heroe. - You can unlock four mine characters.- Incredibly easy operation.Go to adventure!
descriptionHTML:
Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.
Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)
Bonus mode.

Game Features:
- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.
- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.
- Free game: play the game for free!
- Choose your super heroe.
- You can unlock four mine characters.
- Incredibly easy operation.


Go to adventure!
summary: The main goal - to move forward no matter what. Survive at all costs.
title: Quad Squad

description: Hungry? Why eat boring normal food when you can eat colorful and trendy UNICORN food?! Help Ashley, the queen of all things unicorn, live her life with unicorn-colored glasses! Make delicious unicorn food including cakes and ice cream, dress up in glittery rainbow outfits, and enjoy the unicorn lifestyle with Ashley and the other unicorn girls!Ashley is a supercool teen - she’s one of those awesome girls who likes to live like a glitter unicorn! She covers herself in head-to-toe sparkly rainbow garb, styles her hair like a unicorn, and eats delicious rainbow colored unicorn-themed food - she especially loves to bake rainbow cakes! Not to mention her adorable unicorn nails! Help her enjoy her colorful unicorn world with her unicorn-loving friends to the fullest!Features:>Bake colorful and delicious unicorn cakes with Ashley and the girls! Which of these cakes is your favorite: Classic Unicorn or Dripping Rainbow?>Dress Ashley up in the prettiest glittery unicorn outfits! Give her that rainbow style that makes her pop!>Make heavenly colorful unicorn drinks with Ashley - hot chocolate is yummy, but unicorn hot chocolate is OUT OF THIS WORLD!>Style Ashley and her friends’ hair like a unicorn! Don’t forget those glittery rainbow accessories - the girls will love them!>Mmm… unicorn bagels! Breakfast has never been so delightful.>Give Ashley a beautiful, colorful unicorn makeover! Bring out her inner unicorn goddess!>Play a fun unicorn food themed Match-3 minigame!>YUM - you thought the cakes were good? Try the unicorn ice cream! Make it yourself for you, Ashley and the girls!>No unicorn look is complete without rainbow unicorn nails. description: Are you ready to run your very own beauty salon? In Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game your kids can design and create their very own hair styles, or take the ultimate challenge and match their customer's hairstyle of choice perfectly! Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game is a fun hairdressing simulation game where everyone can create the most beautiful, fashionable hairstyles at the touch of a button!With two fantastic modes to play, the fun never stops!Key Features:FREE MODEIn Free Mode, your hair models are ready to let you go to town on their hair, all you need is your creativity!Give it a trim, cut it short of leave it long and flowing; the scissors are always at hand.Smooth and straight is nice, but with Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game you can curl to your heart’s content with a selection of different curling tongs each of which makes a tighter or looser curl!Don’t want to curl all of the hair? That’s okay, with Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game you can pick and choose which hair to curl and which to leave straight. Cut the front short into bangs and leave the back long as you like! Accessories make a big impact. Choose from a wide range of beautiful grips, clips, tiaras and cute little animal ears to really make your creations spectacular!Take a picture and share it with all your friends!COPY MODEAre you ready for the ultimate fashion salon challenge? Your customers know exactly what they want and expect you to get it just right!Follow the guide picture and get to work.First you need to wash your customer’s hair – lean them back into the basin and soak their hair with the shower, then lather in that shampoo till there’s plenty of bubbles! Rinse it all off again and add some conditioner to make that hair tangle free.Take a good look at the picture and begin! You’ll be amazed at the kind of hairstyles your customers want, so many different tastes and fashions! But they don’t just want hairstyles, they also want you to do their make-up and for you to pick out the prettiest dress to go with their perfect style makeover!You’ve got to be on top of your game if you’re going to succeed in the hair salon business but don’t worry, if you make any mistakes you can always use the magic redo cream!Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds
descriptionHTML:
Are you ready to run your very own beauty salon? In Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game your kids can design and create their very own hair styles, or take the ultimate challenge and match their customer's hairstyle of choice perfectly!

Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game is a fun hairdressing simulation game where everyone can create the most beautiful, fashionable hairstyles at the touch of a button!

With two fantastic modes to play, the fun never stops!

Key Features:

FREE MODE
In Free Mode, your hair models are ready to let you go to town on their hair, all you need is your creativity!

Give it a trim, cut it short of leave it long and flowing; the scissors are always at hand.
Smooth and straight is nice, but with Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game you can curl to your heart’s content with a selection of different curling tongs each of which makes a tighter or looser curl!

Don’t want to curl all of the hair? That’s okay, with Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game you can pick and choose which hair to curl and which to leave straight. Cut the front short into bangs and leave the back long as you like!

Accessories make a big impact. Choose from a wide range of beautiful grips, clips, tiaras and cute little animal ears to really make your creations spectacular!

Take a picture and share it with all your friends!

COPY MODE
Are you ready for the ultimate fashion salon challenge? Your customers know exactly what they want and expect you to get it just right!

Follow the guide picture and get to work.

First you need to wash your customer’s hair – lean them back into the basin and soak their hair with the shower, then lather in that shampoo till there’s plenty of bubbles! Rinse it all off again and add some conditioner to make that hair tangle free.

Take a good look at the picture and begin! You’ll be amazed at the kind of hairstyles your customers want, so many different tastes and fashions! But they don’t just want hairstyles, they also want you to do their make-up and for you to pick out the prettiest dress to go with their perfect style makeover!

You’ve got to be on top of your game if you’re going to succeed in the hair salon business but don’t worry, if you make any mistakes you can always use the magic redo cream!

Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds
developer: BATOKI - Best Apps for Toddlers and Kids

description:
After a mind-blowing 70 M+ installs, we now know for a fact that you loved being trolled. That’s why Troll Face Quest is back with an all new, fun trolling sensation: Troll Face Quest Memes! Troll your way around this wacky world as notorious internet memes try to bring you to the brink of insanity. Solve mind-boggling puzzles and beat the wacky memes at their own game!
KOOKY FEATURES• 35+ wacky puzzles that will make you laugh your lungs out!• Unlock wildly insane achievements!• Conquer the global trolling leaderboard!• Play anytime, anywhere. Wi-Fi not needed!
INTERNET MEME FRENZYMake your way through insane levels, where famous internet memes continuously play tricks on you. Attempt to hold onto your wits and not fall into the memes’ traps. Few succeed at beating the memes in their own world of deception and escaping the nuttiness. Think you got what it takes? One fatal mistake and you could end up Forever Alone!
THE TROLLING MEMESThe memes are out to get you. The brain-scratching levels and enraging pranks will have you questioning your sanity. Try to keep your cool and defeat the relentless memes at their own deceptive games!
Do you have the wits to outsmart all the internet memes?

comments: Basically Gran Turismo 3 for Android. 10/10 game and love that ads aren't forced but there is also a reward for watching. It isn't really a grind to get credits. Love the updates especially the Toyota update. Looking forward to more in the future.  02/03/18 edit: Would it be possible to bring back offline mode for us that aren't able to always be online?

I rarely write reviews but this game is a gem in the rough. I love it. Physics are on point, progression feels just right and the audiovisual experience never disappoints. 2 requests though. 1) There's a display glitch: I painted my Dodge SRT Challenger Hellcat purple but in Pro races it displays white. In Drift though it shows purple. Weird. 2) My friends and I would LOVE to see Assoluto X Audi! Can Audi be added? :)

I have a concern about the honda's engine... nsx sound good then the rest sounds like a little off... and could you guys pls take into consideration in fixing the sykylines from r32 to r34... they tend to oversteer alot with or without attessa... and why certain cars have smaller rims?... looks like a drag car... like the skyline r32... after changing rims... its still the same size

So here i was after having earned all the credits to upgrade a turbo mustang and having bought the parts, thinking how cool it was that the developers allowed it to be turbocharged and thought this was an easter egg until the most recent update in which my mustang has lost 200hp and i have lost all the credits i spent upgrading it as a turbo vehicle. Not cool at all. Pretty pissed about this whole situation.

The reason for my lower rating is simply because it's available on the android TV store, I can use a mouse to navigate the interface, but I cannot map the controls to the Nvidia shield gamepad, the inbuilt mapper doesn't recognize most buttons including thumb stick for steering. It effectively makes this game unplayable on the Nvidia shield.

I've upgraded my phone, and now i could really enjoy the full potential of this game. Graphics are absolutely brilliant! I've had mine set on 1440p and max quality, it's beautiful to look at. The physics of the car is awesome, feels like I'm playing a simulation racing game built for PC. It feels that good. The cars, well maybe some of them not properly modelled in my opinion, but it still looks awesome, and the engine sounds..., they're absolutely spot on, especially The AMG GT. Really love that V8 sound. But somehow, i demand a bit of a sound update, because in my opinion, some of it are not similar to the one in real life. It's just a small improvement maybe, but it will give a HUGE immersion in playing Assoluto Racing. For customization, it's enough in my opinion, but adding some aero kit won't let me down tho😂 Multiplayer is the most awesome feature yet, and it works well. Well this is my short review, and it's definitely worth staying on my phone to kill some time. Kudos to the developers😊🙏 Edit : take a look at the 190E Evo, it had a weird rear wheel offset imo, and the Ford Mustang, it's rear wheels are misaligned. They're slightly overlapping the rear bumper.

· Color jungle animals - a sloth, a giraffe, a toucan and a leopard - in your virtual coloring book!
· Watch videos for kids, get coins and use the to unlock new game items!
· Play Baby Animal Hair Salon 2 daily and collect cute trophies!


ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through games they really love.
Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

PRIVACY
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

description: Sackboy, the knitted hero from the multi-award winning LittleBigPlanet™ series on PlayStation® lands into the palm of your hand in this brand new endless platformer! RUN as fast as you can through an ever-changing handcrafted world DASH to ESCAPE the GOO and the clutches of the grumpy Negativitron! *Iconic worlds and characters from the LittleBigPlanet™ games *Exclusive costumes to customise your Sackboy *Collect Stickers to unlock Prizes! *Power Ups and Upgrades including the all-new Glider! *Challenge and compete with your friendsRun SackBoy! Run! is free to download and can be played without making In App Purchases, however some in-game items such as Save Me Hearts can be acquired through in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases on your device.Bubbles can be purchased or can be collected in game at no extra cost. They can also be used to buy special costumes that increase your multiplier, upgrades to power ups, Save Me Hearts or Lucky Chests.Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and uses push notifications, this feature can be turned off by disabling it on your device.A third party Analytics provider (Google Analytics) may collect data about how you use this app. This can be disabled within the settings menu within Run Sackboy! Run!.A valid Facebook account is required to activate Leaderboards.A third party solution (Ad Colony) is used within the game for promotional purposes.
descriptionHTML:
Sackboy, the knitted hero from the multi-award winning LittleBigPlanet™ series on PlayStation® lands into the palm of your hand in this brand new endless platformer!

RUN as fast as you can through an ever-changing handcrafted world
DASH to ESCAPE the GOO and the clutches of the grumpy Negativitron!

*Iconic worlds and characters from the LittleBigPlanet™ games
*Exclusive costumes to customise your Sackboy
*Collect Stickers to unlock Prizes!
*Power Ups and Upgrades including the all-new Glider!
*Challenge and compete with your friends

Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and can be played without making In App Purchases, however some in-game items such as Save Me Hearts can be acquired through in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases on your device.

Bubbles can be purchased or can be collected in game at no extra cost. They can also be used to buy special costumes that increase your multiplier, upgrades to power ups, Save Me Hearts or Lucky Chests.

Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and uses push notifications, this feature can be turned off by disabling it on your device.

A third party Analytics provider (Google Analytics) may collect data about how you use this app. This can be disabled within the settings menu within Run Sackboy! Run!.

A valid Facebook account is required to activate Leaderboards.

A third party solution (Ad Colony) is used within the game for promotional purposes.

comments: The game is cute. Very straightforward and not at all time consuming but relaxing to check in every  once in a while. I loved visiting my Axolotl every day. Mine grew up to almost 9 cm! Unfortunalely, I didn't  check in for a few days. I checked every day until suddenly I forgot. Poor Lottie is gone now but I'm going to do my best to be a good virtual Axolotl owner this time!! The only thing I would like differently is I'd like more interactions with the axolotl and to be able to zoom in. Anyways, its an overall lovely game. Simple but sweet.

It's like having an Axolotl, but on your phone! It's extremely hard to find one around where I live, so I guess this is the closest one I could get for now? I love Axolotls and I dream of getting my own smiling water-walker. They're so cute! Thank you for making this app I love it. But try to make more options in communicating with the little dude. And I like the idea of scrubbing the screens instead of pushing a button. Something that will make it not too button-pressy-game thingy?

AMAZING AND SUPER CUTE! Doesn't take up alot of storage. I think it needs more interactions but that's is! Also could you add a feature to get another pet after your original has been alive for a certain amount of days because they look lonely.

Cute and fun, even if it's not 100% realistic. The axolotl doesn't do much, but neither does a real one. It would be nice if you could change the tank decor and choose different colors of axolotl (or even have a random color when you get a new one). I like that it doesn't require as much care as a real axolotl, who wants a game on their phone to be that much work? I'm also curious to see how big it will get. Real axolotls can get to 30cm or more, but at just under 7cm my virtual one already takes up most of the screen space. All in all I like the app.

I think that you definitely need more things to do. It would be great if you could do more things and maybe get more Axolotl! THEY MUST BE SO LONELY! I also think that it should let u personalise the tank and maybe make it so u can design your Axolotl! Other than that it is a EPIC game. (Will rake 5 star if u do) ;-)

I've got 91 days now. My Axel started out just a little boy & now he's gotten so big. I love my boy(even though he doesn't do anything unless u touch the screen & then he just goes where u direct him)but he's still adorable. My friend downloaded this app same time I did & killed 2 of her pets & gave up. Not a good pet owner(even if it is virtual). I love my Axel. This is cool. It helps teach u some responsibility, if ur humane enough to keep up with the feeding & cleaning.
description: Over one million downloads worldwide!Introducing the 「Axolotl」 to this already popular game!  FREE DOWNLOAD!  It's real easy to raise your own pet in this game!!■Raise your own Axolotl on your smartphone.■Watch how cute your Axolotl moves.  It's so soothing and therapeutic.[Instructions]This is a virtual pet app where you can raise your very own Axolotl on your smartphone.  It`s so easy to raise.  Just feed your pet once every four days and clean its home once a week.  This game app is great for kids and people who find RPG's and puzzle games a bit tedious.  Try this game out!  It's therapeutic, and a great way to kill time![Basic Functions]- It's simple to raise.  Just remember to feed you Axolotl and clean its home.- Like a real Axolotl, it moves around in such an adorable way.- You can call over your Axolotl by tapping on the screen.  Look at how adorable this is!- You can give your Axolotl a name.  You can give it a new name at anytime.- Your Axolotl grows in realtime.  The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.  - The game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.- You can take a picture of your Axolotl with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.- The app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.- You can even transfer your pet's data to a new device so that you can keep the same pet even after you change your mobile device.- All of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions![Recommended for:]- people who have always wanted a Axolotl or already have one and want a virtual Axolotl to spend time with everywhere and at anytime- people who love visiting the zoo and aquariums- people who love raising virtual pets- people who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun
descriptionHTML:
Over one million downloads worldwide!
Introducing the 「Axolotl」 to this already popular game! FREE DOWNLOAD! It's real easy to raise your own pet in this game!!

■Raise your own Axolotl on your smartphone.
■Watch how cute your Axolotl moves. It's so soothing and therapeutic.

[Instructions]
This is a virtual pet app where you can raise your very own Axolotl on your smartphone. It`s so easy to raise. Just feed your pet once every four days and clean its home once a week. This game app is great for kids and people who find RPG's and puzzle games a bit tedious. Try this game out! It's therapeutic, and a great way to kill time!

[Basic Functions]
- It's simple to raise. Just remember to feed you Axolotl and clean its home.
- Like a real Axolotl, it moves around in such an adorable way.
- You can call over your Axolotl by tapping on the screen. Look at how adorable this is!
- You can give your Axolotl a name. You can give it a new name at anytime.
- Your Axolotl grows in realtime. The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.
- The game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.
- You can take a picture of your Axolotl with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.
- The app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.
- You can even transfer your pet's data to a new device so that you can keep the same pet even after you change your mobile device.
- All of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions!

[Recommended for:]
- people who have always wanted a Axolotl or already have one and want a virtual Axolotl to spend time with everywhere and at anytime
- people who love visiting the zoo and aquariums
- people who love raising virtual pets
- people who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun
summary: How would you like to experience the warm feeling of raising your own Axolotl?
title: Axolotl Pet

description: Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.Features•	Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.•	Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.•	Challenging background sound.•	The person with max points will win the game.•	Simple and interesting user interface.•	Invite your family and friends and compete with them.•	Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.
descriptionHTML:
Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.

Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.

Features
• Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.
• Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.
• Challenging background sound.
• The person with max points will win the game.
• Simple and interesting user interface.
• Invite your family and friends and compete with them.
• Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.

So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.

Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.
summary: Rock Paper Scissor is the best addictive app to settle your dispute in a fun way
title: Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle

comments: Honestly a really great game. I only have a cheap head set, but I could jump to move which is a lot of fun honestly. There was a few hit detection problems but that may just be me being salty. Honestly I want more games like this. This is vr done right

The game is over all excellent however the gyroscopic controls could be a little bit better because I notice that the gyroscope would sometimes glitch out of bit, still good tho. Recomended if u have a vr headset laying around :)

This game is amazing, please make more games like this. Also, it might be a little too much, but if dualshock 4 and Xbox one controllers are Bluetooth, you might be able to add a addition to where you can use a controller for your next game, of course it will still be vr. But thanks for making this game, its AWSOME to be able to play one of my favorite game in my favorite ways!
You guys did everything you possibly could to make us smile.I do believe it is right to say that you deserve whatever you want.Please make more apps similar to this.Best app of 2018!

It's fun but hard to use, you can't see around yourself well enough and the jumping thing doesn't work very well. I'll try jumping and then it will either go forward twice or not at all :/ Also the ads are not in vr so you have to take out the phone and then put it back in to stop the ads.
I don't want to be rude or offensive but the game is quite glitchy and slow and I'm not saying it's bad but it's slow..

description: Ever wondered what happens when you leave your puppy home alone? Does your puppy throw a secret disco party? Does she dress up in the most stylish outfits or ride her skateboard around the house?  Find out what really goes on when you’re not home!  Discover your puppy’s secret life - and get ready to party! Features:> Choose from 12 adorable & fluffy pet puppies! > Throw a secret party with your puppy - choose your favorite party music & show off your dance moves! Shhh... it’s a secret! > Sing and chat with your pet puppy - she’ll repeat what you say!> Dress up your puppy in the most adorable outfits & doggy accessories. > Feed your puppy yummy snacks like steak, ice cream, & drumsticks! > Care for your pet puppy when she’s sick. Take her to the doctor’s clinic!> Bathe your puppy - give your pet a warm bubble bath!  > Win tons of awesome toys & furniture to decorate your puppy’s room! ABOUT Coco PlayCoco Play Limited is China-based developer of creative and unique apps for kids. Founded in 2013, Coco Play provides rich 3D simulation-based games for the whole family. Coco Play is a subsidiary of TabTale, a leading, global creator of innovative games, interactive books and educational apps.Visit us: http://www.tabtale.com/ Like us: http://www.facebook.com/TabTaleFollow us:@TabTaleWatch us: http://www.youtube.com/TabtaleCONTACT US Let us know what you think! Questions? Suggestions? Technical Support? Contact us 24/7 at WeCare@TabTale.com.IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR PARENTS: * This App is free to play but certain in-game items may require payment. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device.* By downloading this App you agree to TabTale’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at http://tabtale.com/privacy-policy/ and at http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use/.Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes.
descriptionHTML:
Ever wondered what happens when you leave your puppy home alone?
Does your puppy throw a secret disco party? Does she dress up in the most stylish outfits or ride her skateboard around the house? Find out what really goes on when you’re not home!

Discover your puppy’s secret life - and get ready to party!

Features:
> Choose from 12 adorable & fluffy pet puppies!
> Throw a secret party with your puppy - choose your favorite party music & show off your dance moves! Shhh... it’s a secret!
> Sing and chat with your pet puppy - she’ll repeat what you say!
> Dress up your puppy in the most adorable outfits & doggy accessories.
> Feed your puppy yummy snacks like steak, ice cream, & drumsticks!
> Care for your pet puppy when she’s sick. Take her to the doctor’s clinic!
> Bathe your puppy - give your pet a warm bubble bath!
> Win tons of awesome toys & furniture to decorate your puppy’s room!

comments: The game was pretty good... The only problem though is that the gamer does not always work. The only time I have noted that they don't work too well is when I am trying to build a wall, or wall with a window. It won't let me put it down when the space is clear and on the edge of the raft, I have tried everything!!! Is it the game or my device?

The game is fun or would be if the game automatically saved so if you does you wouldn't have to start completely over. And maybe if it wasn't so hard to survive and probably more fun as well. Survival simulator is much easier and a lot more fun. Also  unlike survival simulator where I can build it doesn't let me build anything even though it says you're supposed to be able to but it didn't allow me to.

Overall very well made. I love it. Its just like the PC version. 👌 2 things however that could make it even better: 1) Sometimes the view would glitch/turn to one side and i didn't even tell the character to look that way. If the devs can fix that and make the turning smoother, that would be great! And 2) Sometimes i can't switch from one item to another. That can be very bad when i am trying to get to my spear to protect my raft or switch to drink my cup of water. Fix those things, and this game will be golden! 👍👌

This is actually a great game. Just sometimes i can't click on something, so i will just go to main menu and then back to game, nothing too serious. And after a few minutes playing, i have 4 nets, 4 trees, 4 potato plants, 4 grillers, 4 purifiers, 4 chests, which i can guarantee that i will never run out of food, water and resources, then this game become boring. Need story or more items to build like maybe bed or something like that. Great job!

Well it had ok graphics and had an ok things to build bit whenever the shark vame i couldnt get out my spear to kill it. Also sometimes it glitched and i couldnt vuild anything. And lastly the hydration and starving meter went down way to fast i was constantly fishing and scooping up water.

This game sucks. Hydration doesn't last at all. And before you can learn to build raft parts, the shark eats your raft.   Mainly, the buttons glitched out and didn't respond for when I wanted to switch to my grapple, or my tin can to collect water. So... im uninstalling.
description: Do you like to play survival games ? Imagine that you are only one person is survived after catastrophic crash in ocean! You found yourself all alone on the small raft wandering in the ocean. There are no signs of earth nearby. You see all kinds of debris passing by that made you realize that you are the only survivor of ship crash! Now you need to fight and struggle for your life if you want to survive! The angry and hungry shark is always near your raft, waiting for you to fall down so you gotta be careful! Gather resources from the water to craft equipment and instruments, find food and drinkable water to stay alive and expand your raft to create more comfortable place to live in!Try to catch barrels, leaves, wood and other staff standing lonely on a raft! Beautiful ocean, wind, waves what else is needed? Yes anything. So throw your hook and try to catch staff!== Survival On Raft features:- Completely new survival experience!- A real raft in the middle of the ocean!- Crafting, building and surviving!- Very cool looking graphics!If you are a huge fan of other survival game ( survival in the sea ), play Raft - Try to Survive simulator – it’ll be just what you’re looking for. Completely new experience when you are on the edge of life and death! Begin your survival adventure now!

comments: On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! It's only happened once to me and I'm on level 41. Now that's saying something. It gives you a super good promise and nope it's gone out the window as soon as you get the game

I have been playing for a while now, I like almost all of the game, not too impressed that "the piggy bank " is basically held to ransom until you buy it... find another way to entice spending... reduce number of coins won or something but as the levels get hard if you dont spend money you get stuck even with team helps.. it gets disheartening and reduces interest after a while.. to the gamemakers: keep the game playable..the money will come

Although this game is addictive and sometimes fun, it seems the producers of the game are greedily taking advantage of people and getting them to pay money for things not worth it(but they feel the pressure to do so, so they do it). Some things in this game are deliberately set up to make the player fail and become desperate to play on and spend. The Champions League is a poor idea which produces terrible prizes for high ranks, and is just a replay of previous played levels which is a let down.

Update...as I go though the levels Ill get stuck for a day or two...even 3 on a level. Gameplay FUN has Dropped significantly. Moved to 3 stars as a result. If it does not change I'll continue to move to 1 star. Games are many to be played...not just stuck on a level forever!  Other issue with the game is that there's so much clicking and waiting once you win. I wish that it would just go right to the next level and it wouldn't have to wait for the splash screen. I just spend so much time wasted versus playing

It's fast and fun so much better than the other new ones. I love playing it. Thank u so much for all your work and the time spent making it a blast to play.  PS getting past level 80 isn't  possible so I quit. Made me so sad.

Don't waste your time playing this game.  I got too 300 + levels but you get 100 coins for completing each level.  Unfortunately it goes in a piggy bank, which you need to pay to break starting from £1.99, then next piggy bank was £4.99.  It's a con!

I don't think I need to 'review' much here. There are some points I definitely don't like about the game. Such as the matchmaking... You get matched with the same deck type in a row. Other than that and some minor flaws it's a great game. I love the competitive aspect about it.  Finally I would suggest some 2v2 with different game modes, such as ramp up 2v2. Also, add the rematch button in 2v2 challenges with random mates.  Hope I hit the 4,3k this season. Good luck to all clashers!

I think Clash Royale is a great game to play and is very well put together for all ages, it is a fast paced game and at the same time can be played with an individual pace of your own to a degree being that there is a clock ticking, also new characters are released at a well balanced rate, so that the game doesn't become boring and the regular balance of the characters strengths and weaknesses are balanced to make the game more competitive. I recommend this game for all ages and abilities. It's great for a few minutes or an hour or so and this game also has several different tournaments you can enjoy yourself or with a friend or a teammate. See you soon on Clash Royale. A.K.A. Dad.

description: Enter the Arena! From the creators of Clash of Clans comes a real-time multiplayer game starring the Royales, your favorite Clash characters and much, much more.Collect and upgrade dozens of cards featuring the Clash of Clans troops, spells and defenses you know and love, as well as the Royales: Princes, Knights, Baby Dragons and more. Knock the enemy King and Princesses from their towers to defeat your opponents and win Trophies, Crowns and glory in the Arena. Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community.Lead the Clash Royale Family to victory!PLEASE NOTE! Clash Royale is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash Royale.A network connection is also required.FEATURES● Duel players from around the world in real-time and take their Trophies● Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect powerful new cards and upgrade existing ones● Destroy opponent’s towers and win Crowns to earn epic Crown chests● Build and upgrade your card collection with the Clash Royale Family along with dozens of your favorite Clash troops, spells and defenses● Construct your ultimate Battle Deck to defeat your opponents● Progress through multiple Arenas all the way to the top● Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community● Challenge your Clanmates and friends to a private duel● Learn different battle tactics by watching the best duels on TV RoyaleSupportAre you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-royale/ or http://supr.cl/ClashRoyaleForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.Privacy Policy: http://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy/Terms of Service:http://supercell.com/en/terms-of-service/Parent’s Guide:http://supercell.com/en/parents/
descriptionHTML:
Enter the Arena! From the creators of Clash of Clans comes a real-time multiplayer game starring the Royales, your favorite Clash characters and much, much more.

Collect and upgrade dozens of cards featuring the Clash of Clans troops, spells and defenses you know and love, as well as the Royales: Princes, Knights, Baby Dragons and more. Knock the enemy King and Princesses from their towers to defeat your opponents and win Trophies, Crowns and glory in the Arena. Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community.

Lead the Clash Royale Family to victory!

PLEASE NOTE! Clash Royale is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash Royale.

A network connection is also required.

FEATURES
● Duel players from around the world in real-time and take their Trophies
● Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect powerful new cards and upgrade existing ones
● Destroy opponent’s towers and win Crowns to earn epic Crown chests
● Build and upgrade your card collection with the Clash Royale Family along with dozens of your favorite Clash troops, spells and defenses
● Construct your ultimate Battle Deck to defeat your opponents
● Progress through multiple Arenas all the way to the top
● Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community
● Challenge your Clanmates and friends to a private duel
● Learn different battle tactics by watching the best duels on TV Royale


Support

description: Do you want to have fun on Christmas holidays? Download our game and you will not be bored in long winter evenings!It is an unforgettable adventure in a mysterious world. In this game there are many randomly generated worlds: from snow-capped mountains and a huge snow-covered forest to tropical jungles and dangerous marshes. Each of these worlds hides many secrets.Here you will feel the freedom for your creativity. To do this, we added a lot of Christmas items to the game, which will create for you an atmosphere of celebration and Christmas magic.Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or get into the wilds of the world in the mode of survival, making weapons and armor to fight its inhabitants. Explore endless worlds and build the most incredible buildings, from simple houses to majestic structures. Have a good game!  Merry Christmas! Features:А lot of Christmas items.Beautiful graphics in high expansion.It is supported by all modern devices.Free flight mode.Two game modes: survival and creativity.Randomly generated maps with complete freedom of action.Dynamically changing world.Many different locations.Many different blocks and objects.For all ages.Please, support the developers - give our game 5 STARS and it will inspire us.
descriptionHTML:
Do you want to have fun on Christmas holidays? Download our game and you will not be bored in long winter evenings!
It is an unforgettable adventure in a mysterious world. In this game there are many randomly generated worlds: from snow-capped mountains and a huge snow-covered forest to tropical jungles and dangerous marshes. Each of these worlds hides many secrets.
Here you will feel the freedom for your creativity. To do this, we added a lot of Christmas items to the game, which will create for you an atmosphere of celebration and Christmas magic.
Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or get into the wilds of the world in the mode of survival, making weapons and armor to fight its inhabitants. Explore endless worlds and build the most incredible buildings, from simple houses to majestic structures.
Have a good game! Merry Christmas!

Features:

А lot of Christmas items.
Beautiful graphics in high expansion.
It is supported by all modern devices.
Free flight mode.
Two game modes: survival and creativity.
Randomly generated maps with complete freedom of action.
Dynamically changing world.
Many different locations.
Many different blocks and objects.
For all ages.

Please, support the developers - give our game 5 STARS and it will inspire us.
summary: Free sandbox, craft. Christmas аdventure. Survival, travel, build, exploration
title: Holiday Craft: Magic Christmas Adventures

comments: Love that you can now earn gems from reading.  However part of the fun of games like this is the outfits and personalization of your character. Outfits and style choices should be free to choose the best one that advances you in the story. It's not fun playing a game that forces you to fail/have a negative outcome. Big decisions/game altering choices should cost gems that makes it fun spending your savings but ultimately free outfit/style choices please

I LOVE THIS! But, just a thing, you could like ask on every episode (that the app creators make) like 'what's your gender and preference to date' because all the creator made ones at like just girls, and I know males play as well. Not hating AT ALL,I LOVE this app SO MUCH! Just tryna help ya improve! Luv you episode! (Or make more that are inclusive of gender) MEOW LOVE U

I really like 90% of this game. However, the way the passes are done really suck. I absolutely love when the 30 days unlimited ad free pass comes up for $9.99. Without it I practically refuse to play. It doesn't seem to be available as of a few days ago. I'm glad I recently purchased. Would also be cool to have a feature where you can send passes to friends.

It's an ok app and this is my third time redownloading it, the character designs have gotten better but there only problem I have, the tickets, like really? 2 tickets? First it was 5, then 3, now only 2. Not everyone has money to waste on games, especially tickets, not only that but their overpriced, like any other add on pack/item. I wouldn't even be surprised if I deleted this and redownloaded back in a year and they only give you one ticket a day.

Love this game! The only part I don't like is that all of the best options cost diamonds and you literally have to pay for them. It makes sense for an app, but it happens to often. It ruins the story because I won't buy any diamonds. I'll rate this 5 stars if they at least change it to not as often.

I LOVE IT except in pitch perfect, ALL the good choices cost 20 diamonds and I'm not wasting my money on all of that. Can you make it less often? And the passes take too long to come back. Or at least make it more passes every 3 hours
description: Episode lets you LIVE your stories. One choice YOU make can change everything! The world’s largest home of visual stories where YOU choose your path. descriptionHTML:
Episode lets you LIVE your stories. One choice YOU make can change everything! The world’s largest home of visual stories where YOU choose your path. Or, become a creator and write your own! <3

Wouldn’t it be amazing if YOU were a character in your favorite story? Episode lets you do just that with over 75,000 gripping stories, where you make choices that matter. From your favorite movie titles like Mean Girls to fan faves such as Bad Boy’s Girl, Episode will keep you interacting for hours.

With all your favorite genres, there’s no time like the present to fall in love, rise to fame, or solve a decade-old mystery. Better yet, join this incredible community and become a creator of your own - writing stories, amassing lots of fans along the way.

Join our #episodesquad for #episodelife.

FOLLOW US:
instagram.com/episode
facebook.com/TheEpisodeApp

THE BELLAS ARE BACK and they’re getting into deep treble. Sing in the spotlight and live out your dream of becoming a BELLA in PITCH PERFECT IN DEEP TREBLE™!

You’ve always dreamed of joining the hottest acapella group in ACA-HISTORY, the Bellas! Now you’re at Barden University and it’s your time to shine. Will you be able to balance auditions and showing off your vocal chops in the riff-off, ALL while being torn between two new love interests?

If you haven’t yet, start reading PRETTY LITTLE LIARS!

- CREATE YOUR PERSONAL LOOK & choose your best outfits
- EXPERIENCE THE SUSPENSE & uncover the mysterious “A”
- FIND LOVE & decide your path to romance

OTHER FEATURED STORIES:

MEAN GIRLS: SENIOR YEAR. Step inside girl world & navigate the drama and romance of Senior Year at North Shore High with Regina George, Cady, Janis, Damian, & the Plastics. You’ll also meet your dream guy but Regina won't let you get him easily.

DEMI LOVATO: PATH TO FAME. After winning a spot on Demi’s tour, it’s time to embrace your true self and define your dream career. Demi shares her advice on taking control of destiny, what choices will YOU make?

FALLING FOR THE DOLAN TWINS. On your first day in LA, you meet the cutest guy you've ever seen—then you meet his twin brother. As you get closer to Ethan & Grayson Dolan, the sparks start to fly...but who will you choose?

description: In this terrifying map for Minecraft you have a unique possibility not only to find yourself in the unusual and creepy world of the popular horror-game, but to play for one of its characters too. If you’re ready to test your nerves, download our new MCPE map for free and imagine yourself a hero of the famous horror-game!In this map for Minecraft you can choose a character, for whom you want to play, and you can a choice of four main heroes: Bendy, Boris, Joe and Henry. As soon as you make a decision, you will get a chest with different unusual things, which will be definitely very useful during the game. Each hero of this map for MCPE has its own plotline and, that’s why things in the chest are completely different, because every character will face special dangers and numerous obstacles. But, nevertheless, no matter whom will you choose, each of this four characters of this exciting map for Minecraft has to go through the maze, avoiding treacherous traps and creepy places, in order to save his/her life and find the way out of this dangerous place. Except this main aim, every character has their own special tasks, which you need to complete too. All action in this map for Minecraft is going on the dark wooden maze, consisting of numerous mazy corridors, cells and creepy places. If you’re not scared, and you’re ready to dive into terrifying world of Bendy and his friends, download our new map for Minecraft for free, and try to survive in this dangerous world of horror-game!You will need to install Minecraft Pocket Edition on your mobile device for this map.DISCLAIMER: This map for MCPE isn’t made or supported by Mojang. Minecraft and Minecraft Pocket Edition are official trademarks of Mojang AB. The developers of this MCPE map don’t cooperate with Mojang. This application fully adheres to the terms set up by Mojang AB. More info at https://account.mojang.com/terms.

description: Building, crafting & exploration in a square world full of awesome planes. Fly an aircraft (plane craft), land, don’t crash and choose one of many machines!  Explore the world, build an airport, craft a plane (from a gunship plane to a passenger huge aircraft!) Fly blocky planes above the cube world! Shoot enemy planes and create your own air force! Build a hangar, mine deep and craft unique items! Design the interior of the luxury jet or create a retro craft! Building & crafting! Airplane simulator! Game for teenage boys!  Become a pilot and fly away! Flight simulator for teenage boys and girls! A cube cargo plane or a giant airbus! You choose! Ace plane craft block! Aircraft survival - block planes! Pocket edition and Exploration with awesome square airplanes! Want to be a pilot? Start the cloud-capt adventure! Super war plane combat game with building and crafting! Fly Wing - the most awesome sandbox game ever made! Free miner games for teens! Take your girlfriend and start the adventure! Build houses, explore the land, create items and weapons start farming and fishing, or simply fly a plane! Build your Dream house craft your dream weapon and chat with your dream girlfriend (you can chat with NPCs). Not interested with airplanes? Build a theme park! Craft, build & ride! Square air! description: Smash or Pass reigns is a popular challenge game where you have to swipe left or right depending if you like or not a given popular character (youtubers and vloggers). Right after you will be presented with the total votes from the rest of the people.This trivia pictures game contain many famous youtubers and vloggers,including men and women, from all over the world. Are you ready for this smash or pass challenge? This either.io type of game is the one played by the vast majority of youtubers doing the youtubers life.FEATURES- Standard game simulator, swipe right or left the presented picture- Real-time results of the quiz pictures sent by others players- Send your quiz pictures (keeping the style of would you rather and either)- track of the raft results of your pictures- Challenge and share with your friends, senpai- Remember to report inappropriate pictures before party hard !In the next party hard mode you will be able to compite with your friends with your own picture and climb high in the ranking,also you will be granted to choose between different scenarios, like the happy room scenario, happy room is part of the party hard modeThe Smash or Pass challenge was inspired by youturbo as pewdiepie and jacksepticeye , similiar to our others game bottle flip challenge and 1000 Degree Knife  which was also raft inspired by them so in case you are one of them please feel free to use this game for your videos.This new version of the game does not contain many ads , we really hope you enjoy this new version.
descriptionHTML:
Smash or Pass reigns is a popular challenge game where you have to swipe left or right depending if you like or not a given popular character (youtubers and vloggers). Right after you will be presented with the total votes from the rest of the people.

This trivia pictures game contain many famous youtubers and vloggers,including men and women, from all over the world. Are you ready for this smash or pass challenge? This either.io type of game is the one played by the vast majority of youtubers doing the youtubers life.

FEATURES

- Standard game simulator, swipe right or left the presented picture
- Real-time results of the quiz pictures sent by others players
- Send your quiz pictures (keeping the style of would you rather and either)
- track of the raft results of your pictures
- Challenge and share with your friends, senpai
- Remember to report inappropriate pictures before party hard !

In the next party hard mode you will be able to compite with your friends with your own picture and climb high in the ranking,also you will be granted to choose between different scenarios, like the happy room scenario, happy room is part of the party hard mode

The Smash or Pass challenge was inspired by youturbo as pewdiepie and jacksepticeye , similiar to our others game bottle flip challenge and 1000 Degree Knife which was also raft inspired by them so in case you are one of them please feel free to use this game for your videos.

This new version of the game does not contain many ads , we really hope you enjoy this new version.
summary: Challenge game where you have to swipe depending if you like or not
title: Smash or Pass

description: It’s Hero Time! Test your skills and reflexes in this action-packed turn-based fighting game with a unique puzzle style battle system! Play as Ben Tennyson and unlock his alien powers as he fights against intergalactic threats!Unleash your favorite aliens from the Ben 10 Ultimate Alien TV series. As Ben Tennyson, you must level up and use the powers of various alien forms to stop Aggregor and other villains across the galaxy. Battle against foes, collect new alien DNA, unlock new alien forms and upgrade their powers! Take down the Forever Knights, Charmcaster, and even some secret Ultimate Foes. Ben’s journey will take you to the ends of the galaxy and give you a chance to discover all-new alien forms and powers.--New Battle System--The game features a new reflex-based puzzle mechanic in which you use careful timing to select the action that you want to make, and a tag-team system that lets you and your opponent pair up with another alien.AI opponents will telegraph their moves at the start of battle and will shuffle through them or even switch to its partner. Keeping a close eye on your opponent’s maneuvers, taking note of which moves to use, and skillful timing in selecting moves and tagging-out are all essential to win your battles.--Multiple Game Modes!-- Unravel the full story or simply have a quick battle. Use the aliens you have unlocked and leveled up to challenge the AI in arcade mode. Finally, test your endurance in the special Hero Time survival mode.Every battle you win gets you closer to becoming the most powerful Ultimate Alien! It's Hero Time!FEATURES- Smart and fun control system- Unique and intuitive puzzle mechanic that adds to the game’s challenge- Level up your alien forms and use Ultimate power-ups- Play as 9 different Alien Forms such as Rath, Ultimate Humungousaur, Waterhazard, Ampfibian, NRG, Armodrillo, Ultimate Swampfire, Ultimate Big Chill and Ultimate Cannonbolt.- 8 Stages to do battle in, from Ben’s hometown to the ends of the galaxy- Incredibly fun endless gameplay!- Battle against 15 different foes including Charmcaster, Forever Knights, Aggrebots (Aggregor's robot minions), Ultimate Aggregor, Kevin Levin (Ultimate Kevin) and also Charmcaster's Stone Creatures and more!- One of the largest character rosters in any BEN 10 game to date- Pair up your favorite aliens with the new tag-team system!- Versus Mode battles- Test your skill and endurance in Hero Time ultimate survival mode.** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience.You may control in-app purchases made within this app using password protection which can be enabled from the setting page of the Google Play Store app. **
descriptionHTML:
It’s Hero Time! Test your skills and reflexes in this action-packed turn-based fighting game with a unique puzzle style battle system! Play as Ben Tennyson and unlock his alien powers as he fights against intergalactic threats!

Unleash your favorite aliens from the Ben 10 Ultimate Alien TV series. As Ben Tennyson, you must level up and use the powers of various alien forms to stop Aggregor and other villains across the galaxy. Battle against foes, collect new alien DNA, unlock new alien forms and upgrade their powers! Take down the Forever Knights, Charmcaster, and even some secret Ultimate Foes. Ben’s journey will take you to the ends of the galaxy and give you a chance to discover all-new alien forms and powers.

--New Battle System--
The game features a new reflex-based puzzle mechanic in which you use careful timing to select the action that you want to make, and a tag-team system that lets you and your opponent pair up with another alien.

AI opponents will telegraph their moves at the start of battle and will shuffle through them or even switch to its partner. Keeping a close eye on your opponent’s maneuvers, taking note of which moves to use, and skillful timing in selecting moves and tagging-out are all essential to win your battles.

--Multiple Game Modes!--
Unravel the full story or simply have a quick battle. Use the aliens you have unlocked and leveled up to challenge the AI in arcade mode. Finally, test your endurance in the special Hero Time survival mode.

Every battle you win gets you closer to becoming the most powerful Ultimate Alien! It's Hero Time!

FEATURES
- Smart and fun control system
- Unique and intuitive puzzle mechanic that adds to the game’s challenge
- Level up your alien forms and use Ultimate power-ups
- Play as 9 different Alien Forms such as Rath, Ultimate Humungousaur, Waterhazard, Ampfibian, NRG, Armodrillo, Ultimate Swampfire, Ultimate Big Chill and Ultimate Cannonbolt.
- 8 Stages to do battle in, from Ben’s hometown to the ends of the galaxy
- Incredibly fun endless gameplay!
- Battle against 15 different foes including Charmcaster, Forever Knights, Aggrebots (Aggregor's robot minions), Ultimate Aggregor, Kevin Levin (Ultimate Kevin) and also Charmcaster's Stone Creatures and more!
- One of the largest character rosters in any BEN 10 game to date
- Pair up your favorite aliens with the new tag-team system!
- Versus Mode battles
- Test your skill and endurance in Hero Time ultimate survival mode.

** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience.You may control in-app purchases made within this app using password protection which can be enabled from the setting page of the Google Play Store app. **
developerAddress: 30/F, Oxford House, 979 King's Rd., Taikoo Place, Quarry Bay, Hong Kong

description: Are you crazy fans of fire and water or fire and ice (teamwork game) ?Fall in love adventure maze game and remember it from childhood ?Fire Red boy and his lover (ice girl - Water girl) who go with him is a puzzle adventure game for two players. It's an very addicting game to play with your kids, your lover and your friend.You've got two characters to control in this exciting puzzle game. Lead Red boy and Water girl to their doors in each level of the Crystal Temp Maze, collecting fire diamonds and ice diamonds along the way. Red boy must avoid the water and Ice girl must avoid the fire, and be careful, the black water kills them both. Using your brain to control objects in game such as lever, pusher, mirror, black ball, light beam, elevator, wind machine, pulley systemin order to open path that leads to the doors.GREAT GAME FEATURES:- 30 Maps and continue update - Nice character fire boy is red boy- Nice character blue girl is water girl- Always support .All levels are updating frequently- Nice Soundtrack- Classic gameplay from web- Back to childhood

description: Its mechanics is very simple you only have to press with your finger the badly placed pieces of road and look for the correct position until forming and completing the car puzzle. All parts must be properly connected. Demonstrate your mental ability and become part of the great players. Intelligence video games are an excellent way to improve brain performance. Each exercise is a riddle that urges us to look for the right result. They are puzzles with a unique answer, looking for solutions to each problem.This game has difficult puzzles at higher levels. It has a perfect learning level for those players looking for fun without having to eat their head. If you like math puzzles this is your game. Solve each puzzle with exact solutions.Exercise memory for free with this logic and strategy video game. Playing will make you think and test you. Solve the visual puzzles 100% free and get inside the club of the wit of the most intelligent people in the world as the genius Einstein. Complete this puzzle car puzzle with progressive difficulty. Look for the right path as in the pipe games and build the race track.It will be the ABC of all your mental agility pastimes and test your intelligence. Complete the levels and dashboard forming the race tracks, join the roads. Practice with these games to exercise your mind: reasoning, logic, memory and mental / cognitive skills to train throughout your life to get your brain in shape. With the practice of mental exercises will help improve your ability to solve mathematical problems in your daily life.Logic puzzles | Cars puzzle contains:- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.- Different sections of roads.- Simple logic.- Simple and intuitive controls.- Difficulty of puzzles from easier to more difficult.- Does not contain purchases within the application.- Hours of fun.- No annoying ads.- Car puzzle game that you must build racing car circuits.- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.- Video game totally free.- You do not need the Internet.- It takes up little space.- You can train the mind.Remember that logic is the branch of philosophy that studies the geometries and general principles that rule over all knowledge and human thought, considered purely in itself, without reference to objects. In addition to being a method or reasoning in which ideas or the sequence of events that are manifested or are developed in a coherent way and without there being contradictions between them.* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *Do not forget to vote, rate and / or comment on the Google Play Store in order to improve (suggestions, graphic errors, translation errors, improvements, suggestions ...)

comments: I  love this game but why does it take 30 minutes for a life to refill and also why does everyone who plays the game not receive ten lives only some of your players this needs to be fixed it's not fair I've been playing for years and only receive five lives at a time when others receive ten lives.I play other games and the lives refill every 7 to 15 minutes. Can you please make changes

So far, I dig this game. Although, the individuality of it is scarce. I still play it and enjoy it. It's not identical to other games of this type, as the challenges are similar yet different. The scenario of the game is basic with the others. I have a variety when it comes to games, this one has similar sound affects to other games that I, personally, downloaded. (But they're also from the same makers.) This game is over all.... Good so far.. I would recommend, linked my account to this game and invited friends and family. (I only do so, if the game/app is worthy. I'm a picky bull!!!!) Overall, you'll have fun! Cute toys and  unique power ups, with a slightly (10%) twist.

Definitely addicting. The levels are challenging, the tools are fun to figure out and the reward set up is not unattainable. The only other thing is they grew more wise  for the latest update, you can't change the time on your phone to add lives anymore! Probably better that way, one (read: I) should pace themselves when playing....

This is by far the most fun I've  had with a game app! Its so cute and  colorful!  And each increase in difficulty  makes you want to keep coming back for the next challenge.  What also makes it awesome  is a no brainer,  its great for children and adults alike.  BIG THUMBS UP!

Really enjoyed the game until I was entered in a two week tournament.  Now, the boards are incredibly difficult and I can no longer earn prizes on a regular basis. Of course, I suppose that's by design so I spend money. Which I won't do. I just want some "bubblegum" to past the time.  Now, it's making my blood pressure rise...  Also amazing how many 5 ⭐ ratings they get in one day without the user giving explanations on why. Seems suspicious...

Not happy! I'm up to level 1521 and for some reason it's taken me back to level 1. What is going on? I've been playing for about a year and NOT happy I'm back to level 1 again. This has now happened to me 3 times where I have been at maximum levels into the legends arena and BOOM! All my levels are gone all my boosters  - which I have paid hundreds of dollars buying are gone. Support do not respond to my repeated requests to resolve this. Very disappointed I've been playing this for almost 2 years.

description: Cute baby panda Lu promises new and crazy nanny games for kids and toddlers! Play and explore different rooms in the house, and learn many new things with chubby and sweet baby panda Lu.Start your babysitting adventures and become the best panda nanny! Give panda Lu a shower in the rain or with an elephant. Prepare food and find out what she likes the most. Follow your virtual friend to the living room and do some fun housework. Don't forget to help your mummy at home too! When sleepy and tired, put baby panda Lu to bed and help her fall asleep after a long and wonderful day. descriptionHTML:
Cute baby panda Lu promises new and crazy nanny games for kids and toddlers! Play and explore different rooms in the house, and learn many new things with chubby and sweet baby panda Lu.

Start your babysitting adventures and become the best panda nanny! Give panda Lu a shower in the rain or with an elephant. Prepare food and find out what she likes the most. Follow your virtual friend to the living room and do some fun housework. Don't forget to help your mummy at home too! When sleepy and tired, put baby panda Lu to bed and help her fall asleep after a long and wonderful day.

Panda Lu Baby Bear Care 2 new nanny games for kids and toddlers:
· Let's get crazy in a safe and interactive baby panda bear world!
· Take care of furry and cute baby panda Lu all day long!
· Shower with an elephant, with a car or have a mud bath!
· Give delicious baby food for hungry and cute baby panda Lu!
· Sort your things in the closet and make your room clean and tidy!
· Get a bottle of milk, change diapers and put baby panda Lu to sleep!
· Play every day and watch videos for kids and toddlers to get bonus coins!
· Level up, unlock and collect new best nanny trophies!


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

IMPORTANT message to parents
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

descriptionHTML:
Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.

List of safety tips:

- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator
- Stand straight facing the elevator's door
- Press the button of the desired level
- Keep the elevator neat and clean
- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level
- Stand still till the door is completely open
- Prefer stairs in case of fire

Lift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. The safety game is designed specifically for kids.

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  🤗😠👍

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

Ultimate bowling 2014 This is by far one of the better bowling games I have ran across in very long time. You have more choices when it comes to the bowling balls, better control of the ball as you are sending it down the lane, I could go on but the one thing I would like to see change would be for you to show the pins like they do in real bowling that have gone down on your first shot like off to the side somewhere. This would make it even more realistic, otherwise I can't find a thing wrong so far with the game..hope you enjoy

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.
Crappy.. No arrows on the lanes and you can throw the ball 200 mph.. Kinda OK game if your not really looking for the bowling experience..

comments: The game is good to play. But even though you have guessed the word it doesn't submit until you've spent coins to get hints. This happens after every 3/4 levels. After it happened for the sixth to seventh time, I started making a note of what words I tried. Not good, needs fixing ASAP. Luckily for me, I'm not one to waste money buying coins.

Should be able to spell words no matter how many letters are only recommend. Would've had a lot more coins if that wasn't such a limiting factor. Definitions should be added after word is found in case user wants to know what he/she spelled. At least, I want to know what the definition is. That way, I am learning new words. Enhancing my vocabulary as what this app was created/designed for. Right? Right?

If you like words, this is the place to go. However, if you have a question or an issue, they don't respond. Has an issue I've contacted them about (never any response), loses your entries many times after long unused periods. Very frustrating.

Really enjoyed the game. Fun to play, keep coming back, sometimes letters are too close together and it is hard to select the ones you want without others getting in the way. The present doesn't ever give me above 39 coins. It's either rigged or I am very unlucky.

this it a junk game please do not get it. you will wast your time it is junk. you will be happy you listened to me. it makes me want to smash my chromebook. this game gets me so mad i am going to delete it do not download it fix the game right know I drag the word from the top and the number drags from the bottom. FIX IT RIGHT KNOW PLEASE THANK YOU SO MUCH the person who made this game is retarted

description: Are you ready to face the Scary Shark? Brace yourselves...because the beast is back! Just as monstrous as before, sharks are back to chew through your sense of safety! Attack unexpecting campers and beach-goers! Play as this astounding yet terrifying aquatic mammal.Navigate its home and ocean environment full of multiple sea creatures and prey. Say hello to fish and stingrays, dolphins, and whales. But beware of bounty hunters and snipers. Defend your home and fulfill your voracious appetite! In this game, it’s HUNT or be HUNTED!Use your keen sense of smell to find and chase the innocent human enjoying the water on a sunny, calm day. Attack boats, surfers, and jet skiis with your massive jaws and tear them to shreds! Don’t let them escape, or they will bring friends and lifeguards to hunt you! Swim and creep under boardwalks, docks, and different water environments. The deadliest games of 2017 awaits you.Scary Shark Evolution 3D Features:• Realistic Beach environments to explore• Multiple Missions packed with Hunting Thrill• Multiple Texture of Scary Shark to Choose from• Smooth, Easy & Addictive gameplay• Real water physics, cool Shark movements and animations• Beautifully crafted 3D graphics and realistic water environments: including beaches, docks and the open sea• Amazing joystick simulator controls to make the Shark swim and attack• Exciting Sharks missions for you to create chaos• Super Awesome Visuals and sound EffectsInstall and enjoy as a fearless Scary Shark Evolution Adventures!
